Collection.LongName: MOPITT Derived CO (Near and Thermal Infrared Radiances)
Collection.DataSetId: MOPITT Derived CO (Near and Thermal Infrared Radiances) V007
Collection.Description: The MOPITT Level 2 data product consists of the geolocated, retrieved carbon monoxide profiles and total column amounts for carbon monoxide. Ancillary data concerning surface properties and cloud conditions at the locations of the retrieved parameters are also included. Each retrieval is accompanied by an estimated error. Measurements Of Pollution In The Troposphere (MOPITT) was successfully launched into sun-synchronous polar orbit aboard Terra, NASA's first Earth Observing System spacecraft on December 18, 1999. The MOPITT instrument was constructed by a consortium of Canadian companies and funded by the Space Science Division of the Canadian Space Agency.
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical Quantities at the sensor resolution or geolocated
Collection.VersionDescription: Joint TIR/NIR-based CO retrievals based on MERRA 2 meteorological fields, time-varying N2O and updated HITRAN data
